message.content:
I need to identify the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period from the cash flow statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement provided, I can see a section labeled "Cash and Cash Equivalents" which includes three line items:
1. Beginning Balance: 8000000.00
2. Ending Balance: 3276562.05
3. Net Increase: -4723437.95

The line item we need is "Beginning Balance" which represents the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period. The value is 8000000.00.

```json
{"solution": {"value": "8000000.00"}}
```
